entry.title: Wolf Among Flowers
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,633Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 59

Summary: “Gerard wanted me to think you were cruel—crueler than him, actually.” Derek stood to his full height, taking a step closer to Stiles as he placed his thumb and forefinger against Stiles’ chin. He was gentle in his prompting—the gentlest he had been since the last time he had held Cora as a baby. “I would never make you hunt. I would never make you kill.” Stiles blinked, his mouth partially parting. But he didn’t know what to say. “I never wish that feeling on anyone,” Derek finally stated, dropping his hand from Stiles. ~*~ Or Beauty and the Beast vibes, also known as the one where scarred, battle weary Prince Derek Hale is married by proxy to the adorable, bookworm scholar Stiles Stilinski.

entry.title: Sparked: Part 1
entry.summary:
Author: HitopCub

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 353,512Chapters: 22/44Kudos: 44

Summary: After The Alignment - a cosmic therapy session led by his and Derek's future son from an alternate reality - Stiles Stilinski's latent spark abilities are awakened. Now he's diving into his first six months of magical training with a prestigious coven, hidden on the 13th floor of a Silicon Valley tech giant.Stiles navigates a world where cutting-edge tech meets ancient magic. He's juggling unpredictable spark powers, bonding with fellow apprentices, and trying not to spill interdimensional secrets (like being married to Derek in another reality). Meanwhile, he's nurturing dreams of opening an apothecary in Beacon Hills.But it's not all cinnamon rolls and spell books. A sinister presence is sabotaging Stiles' training, and rumors of a spy threaten to tear the coven apart. Stiles must unravel these mysteries while mastering his abilities and grappling with growing feelings for Derek.With help from old and new friends, Stiles faces challenges that will shape his future as a spark. "Sparked: Part 1" is a tale of magic, mayhem, and coming-of-age, proving that in six months, anything can happen - especially when you're a spark-in-training with a knack for trouble and a head full of secrets.

entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 282,139Chapters: 21/24Kudos: 1,257

Summary: Stiles is just trying to prevent the next supernatural problem from killing his friends. Derek is just trying to keep his pack alive (and ignore the desperation that crawls under his skin whenever Stiles is near). When Stiles goes into the preserve to investigate a string of murders, he and Derek are kidnapped by an unknown group and locked in a basement with no escape. Each night brings new suffering, and each day they have only each other. The two will have to learn how to lean on one another to keep their sanity intact, and they’ll have to work together to escape. Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.

entry.title: They May Have Fallen But We Still Stand
entry.summary:
Author: Effra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,035Chapters: 8/16Kudos: 104

Summary: Lieutenant Stiles Stilinski of the Nemetan rifle regiment can't find it in his heart to celebrate the end of the long and bloody war against the darachs. Perhaps it’s the faces that swim behind his eyelids, lost to time, dark magic and musket balls, or perhaps it’s the doubt he harbours that he can truly be good at anything except being a soldier. Regardless, as he huddles at one end of the bar, nursing an ale barely worthy of the name, he listens as the locals sing their songs and toast to the fallen. He doesn't think about the men he has lost, and he definitely doesn't think about alpha Lord Hale, leader of the Triskellan battle-pack, who was last seen leaping into the heart of the fighting with typical reckless heroism. Even if Hale had survived the battle, nothing could or would ever happen between them. Shifters were too different from humans - too wild, too strange. It didn't matter that Stiles felt like the only person who could see past the teeth and claws to the heart of the man beneath them. They were from two different worlds.

entry.title: Heat Sick
entry.summary:
Author: ao3enchantress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,665Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 48

Summary: Stiles doesn’t mean to forget things. But when the pharmacy was out of his ADHD meds, and told him to come back in three days, he… didn’t. He forgot. Twice. Derek noticed — of course he noticed — and ended up picking them up himself. Restarting the meds solved one problem but caused another. Appetite gone, hydration forgotten, routine shot, Stiles drifted into his upcoming heat without the supplements, nutrition, or stability an omega needs to ride it out safely. He didn’t know he was running on empty …until the heat ended, and his body crashed. Heat sickness is rare — a dangerous post‑heat complication where a depleted omega’s hormones fail to regulate. Fever. Muscle pain. Emotional collapse. Bond instability. Nonverbal regression. The body tries to finish the heat alone, even after it’s over — and it hurts. For six days, Stiles is barely aware of anything except pain, instinct, and the overwhelming need for his alpha.

entry.title: When the Moon Rises (We Fall Apart)
entry.summary:
Author: AnomeeChan

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,561Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Stiles figures out Scott's a werewolf, but Scott refuses to listen. With the full moon approaching and Scott too focused on first line and Allison to care about control, Stiles goes looking for answers on his own. A late-night trip to the Hale house gets him chased by the Alpha and saved by Derek Hale, who's not the monster Scott thinks he is. As their friendship fractures over Scott's anger and denial, Stiles finds himself caught between his best friend pushing him away and a werewolf who keeps showing up when it matters. Derek returns Stiles' phone, talks him down from dark thoughts, trains him to survive, and proves he's trying to help. But Scott, convinced Derek is the killer, frames him for his sister's murder. Trust shifts. Lines blur. With the full moon and Scott's first game colliding at Lydia's party, Stiles has to choose between the best friend who won't listen and the werewolf who keeps saving his life. Because if Scott's alive, that's better than dead, even if it means standing on Derek's side before either of them is ready to admit what that means
